original_text:
Fruit Shop Christmas Edition
Fruit Shop è uno dei giochi più amati del catalogo della software house NetEnt, rivisitato qui in chiave natalizia. Il tema è presto detto: ci si rifà alla tradizione delle Fruit Machine, con l’aggiunta di un pochino di neve e qualche simbolo legato al Natale!
Le Fruit Machine sono le prime slot machine in assoluto: nelle sale da bar le vecchie macchinette a tre rulli avevano tra i loro simboli dei frutti colorati, tanto che il logo delle slot stesse in generale era rappresentato dalle ciliegie, le mitiche Cherries!
Nel corso degli anni le migliori software house hanno proposto slot ipertecnologiche, con effetti speciali spettacolari, che quasi sembrano dei film o dei videogiochi d’azione (vedi, per esempio, Gladiator, tratta dall’omonimo colossal cinematografico), nonostante ciò nessuna novità è riuscita a cancellare le Fruit Machine! Le slot fruttate, caratterizzate oltre che dalla grafica sempre piuttosto minimale e da gameplay facili e intuitivi, oltre che catturare i nostalgici, rappresentano spesso il primo approccio alle slot machine per i giocatori che si affacciano per la prima volta in questo mondo.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
Fruitshop Christmas Edition ha una griglia di gioco molto semplice, con cinque rulli e tre righe, incorniciate nella bancarella che già avevamo visto nella precedente versione, con un pupazzo di neve sulla sinistra e le lucine colorate.
Le linee di pagamento sono solo 15 ma ci sono ben 70 combinazioni di scommessa, con puntate a partire da soli 0,01 gettone e 10 livelli di gioco.
Fruitshop Christmas Edition è molto facile e intuitiva come gameplay, nonostante questo, offre delle buone opportunità di vincita e non vi farà di certo annoiare!
Potete giocare a Fruitshop Christmas Edition da computer e dispositivi mobili, sia con soldi veri, sia in versione demo, per divertirvi senza spendere un solo centesimo!
Simboli e funzionalità di Fruitshop Christmas Edition
La NetEnt include nei suoi giochi sempre funzionalità interessanti e anche in questo caso, nonostante Fruitshop Christmas Edition sia una slot abbastanza semplice, nasconde delle funzioni niente male!
Questa slot fruttata- natalizia ha una funzionalità free spins nuova: ogni giro vincente, infatti, non paga solo la vincita ma regala anche un numero variabile di giri gratuiti, secondo il seguente schema:
• 2 o 3 ciliegie assegnano un giro gratuiti, 4 ne assegnano 2 e con 5 si hanno 5 free spins
• Meloni, limoni, arance e prugne, che hanno valore minore rispetto alle cherries, assegnano un giro gratuito per una combinazione vincente di 3 simboli, due se i simboli sono 4 e infine, tre giri gratuiti se la combinazione vincente è data da 5 simboli uguali.
In virtù di questa particolare modalità di assegnazione dei giri gratuiti, non esiste un simbolo Scatter, ma è presente invece un Wild, rappresentato dal logo del gioco, che ha la funzione di jolly e offre anche un moltiplicatore x2.

raw_translation.response:
Fruit Shop Christmas Edition

Fruit Shop is one of the most beloved games in NetEnt's catalog, revisited here with a Christmas twist. The theme is simple: it harkens back to the tradition of Fruit Machines, with a bit of snow and some symbols related to Christmas added in!

Fruit Machines were the very first slot machines ever produced: in the bars, the old three-reel machines had colorful fruit symbols, so much so that the logo for slots in general was represented by cherries, the legendary Cherries!

Over the years, the best software houses have offered hyper-technological slots, with spectacular special effects that almost seem like action movies or video games (see, for example, Gladiator, based on the eponymous movie), but no new development has succeeded in erasing Fruit Machines! These fruity slots, characterized by their always minimalist graphics and easy and intuitive gameplay, as well as capturing nostalgia, often represent the first approach to slot machines for players entering this world for the first time.

Main features of the slot machine

Fruitshop Christmas Edition has a very simple game grid, with five reels and three rows, framed in the stall that we had already seen in the previous version, with a snowman on the left and colorful lights.

There are only 15 paylines, but there are 70 possible bet combinations, with bets starting at just 0.01 token and 10 game levels.

Fruitshop Christmas Edition is very easy and intuitive in terms of gameplay, but still offers good winning opportunities and won't bore you!

You can play Fruitshop Christmas Edition on both computers and mobile devices, with real money or in demo version, to have fun without spending a single penny!

Symbols and features of Fruitshop Christmas Edition

NetEnt always includes interesting features in its games, and in this case, despite Fruitshop Christmas Edition being a fairly simple slot, it hides some pretty good features!

This fruity-Christmas slot has a new free spins feature: every winning spin not only pays out, but also awards a variable number of free spins, according to the following scheme:

• 2 or 3 cherries award one free spin, 4 award 2 and with 5 you get 5 free spins.
• Melons, lemons, oranges, and plums, which have a lower value than cherries, award one free spin for a winning combination of 3 symbols, two if the symbols are 4, and finally, three free spins if the winning combination is made up of 5 identical symbols.

Thanks to this special mode of assigning free spins, there is no Scatter symbol, but instead, there is a Wild symbol, represented by the game logo, which functions as a wildcard and also offers a x2 multiplier.

Review: Fruit Shop Christmas Edition
Fruit Shop is one of the most beloved games in the NetEnt software house catalog, revised here in a Christmas key. The theme is easy to understand: it refers to the Fruit Machine tradition, with the addition of a little snow and some symbols related to Christmas!
Fruit Machines are the very first slot machines ever: in bar rooms, the old three-reel machines had some colorful fruits among their symbols, to the point that the logo of slot machines in general was represented by cherries, the mythical Cherries!
Over the years, the best software houses have proposed hyper-technological slots, with spectacular special effects, which almost seem like action movies or video games (see, for example, Gladiator, based on the eponymous cinematic colossal), despite this, no innovation has managed to erase the Fruit Machines! Fruity slots, characterized not only by minimalist graphics and easy and intuitive gameplay, as well as capturing nostalgics, often represent the first approach to slot machines for players who are new to this world.
Main features of the slot machine
Fruitshop Christmas Edition has a very simple game grid, with five reels and three rows, framed in the market stall that we had already seen in the previous version, with a snowman on the left and colored lights.
There are only 15 paylines but there are as many as 70 betting combinations, with bets starting from just 0.01 token and 10 levels of play.
Fruitshop Christmas Edition is very easy and intuitive to play, despite this, it offers good winning opportunities and will certainly not bore you!
You can play Fruitshop Christmas Edition on your computer and mobile devices, both with real money and in demo version, to have fun without spending a single penny!
Symbols and features of Fruitshop Christmas Edition
NetEnt always includes interesting features in its games and even in this case, despite Fruitshop Christmas Edition being a fairly simple slot, it hides some pretty good functions!
This fruity-Christmas slot has a new free spins feature: each winning spin, in fact, not only pays the winnings but also gives a variable number of free spins, according to the following scheme:
• 2 or 3 cherries give one free spin, 4 give 2 and with 5 you have 5 free spins
• Melons, lemons, oranges, and plums, which have less value than cherries, give one free spin for a winning combination of 3 symbols, two if the symbols are 4 and finally, three free spins if the winning combination is made up of 5 identical symbols.
Due to this particular mode of free spin awarding, there is no Scatter symbol, but instead, there is a Wild symbol, represented by the game logo, which has the function of a wild and also offers a x2 multiplier.
